title: Corda Messaging Configuration Schema
description: Configuration schema for the messaging subsection. This configures the interactions of the workers with the underlying message bus.

bus.description: Settings for the underlying bus implementation. Sets up connection details and how underlying bus objects behave.

busType.description: Which bus implementation is currently in use.

bus.$comment: Polymorphic bus connection configuration. The valid section depends on which bus implementation is in use.

kafkaProperties.description: Kafka connection properties to use to connect to the broker

username.description: Cluster admin username to connect to the database with.

subscription.description: Configuration options for subscriptions that process messages on the bus.

publisher.description: Settings for publishers that write messages to the underlying bus
